mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memEmail, memPassword, memName, memNickname, memBirthday, memIp, memClass, memDate) VALUES(#{memEmail}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memNickname}, #{memBirthday}, #{memIp}, 1, curdate());
